Idioms.phrase: On a wing and a prayer

Which means, With a good understanding of a situation and a readiness to act..

Which means, A rare occurrence..
Which means, Engaged in active fighting or dispute..
Which means, Still used with its literal meaning of 'beyond the range of sight' but more commonly used in its hippie-era meaning of 'excellent; extraordinary'..

Which means, Out enjoying oneself..
Which means, Said when you absolutely refuse to allow something to happen..
Which means, Excessive..

Which means, Avoid responsibility by giving it to someone else..
Which means, To go at full speed, when driving a vehicle..
Which means, Excellent; wonderful..
Which means, Someone who covertly observes sexually active or naked people..
Which means, 1. to die, especially to die of old age. 2. to complete a circuit of the board in the card game cribbage..

Which means, Perform an act in an uncommitted disinterested manner..

Idioms.definition: Which means, Deceive someone..

Which means, Tricking someone as a joke..
Which means, An instruction to a noisy person or a group to be quiet..

Which means, Instruction to get out of bed and get ready for work..
